use_cases.case: The authors ran a BLAST search against the genome of Zymomonas mobilis subsp. mobilis ZM4 (NC_006526) to predict mRNA targets of the sRNAs Zms4 and Zms6.

The authors used the genome of Zymomonas mobilis subsp. mobilis ZM4 (NC_006526) to benchmark the inTherAcc algorithm against IntaRNA for predicting and evaluating hybrdization efficacy based on in vivo experimental data.
